entry.name: iron-skillet-version
entry.comments: version 0.0.1 for 10.2: version of this IronSkillet template file

entry.name: Outbound Block Rule
entry.description: Block outbound sessions with destination address matching one of the Palo Alto Networks external dynamic lists for high risk and known malicious IP addresses.

entry.name: Inbound Block Rule
entry.description: Block inbound sessions with source address matching one of the Palo Alto Networks external dynamic lists for high risk and known malicious IP addresses.

entry.name: NO-Decrypt URL Categories
entry.description: This rule does not do Decryption. This rule is validating SSL Protocol Communications.

system.login-banner: You have accessed a protected system.Log off immediately if you are not an authorized user.
